alert.note: Alert for Nacogdoches; Rusk; San Augustine; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 9:23PM CDT until May 16 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following bayou in Texas... Attoyac Bayou Near Chireno affecting Rusk, Nacogdoches, San Augustine and Shelby Counties. For the Attoyac Bayou...including Chireno...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Attoyac Bayou Near Chireno. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Expect flooded paths and secondary roadways. Move livestock and equipment to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 13.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 16.6 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Saturday evening at 930 PM CDT.
